Service Details: - Offers parenting education and support groups, that include Creative Playtime – a drop-in parent support group;  Special Deliveries- a prenatal education and support group; and Wee-Tots- parent and tot education and support group- All programs offer a warm and welcoming environment for parents and their children (0-6y) where they can have some creative fun, connect with other families, relax and enjoy healthy snacks and find out more about other resources in the community- Also offers guest speakers occasionally who provide information and expertise in the area of health, nutrition, wellness and life-skills- All CAPC groups are led by qualified and experienced parenting support facilitators
Cost: None; these groups are offered at no cost
